portfolio.title: Spotification
portfolio.description: Spotify API that pulls user data and displays the Spotify users public playlists as well as top artists and tracks within different time periods.

portfolio.title: Sorting Visualizer
portfolio.description: React website that provides a visualization of how Merge Sort efficiently sorts an array of randomly assigned values.

portfolio.title: Note Keeper
portfolio.description: Dynamic note keeping application created using React hooks to post notes to a list visually displayed on a board.

portfolio.title: Path Finder
portfolio.description: Path finding application designed to find the shortest path between a designated start and end point using an A* Search implementation through Python.

portfolio.title: Connect4 AI
portfolio.description: Python AI created to play a perfect game of Connect4 using the Mini-Max algorithm along with alpha-beta pruning to aid in informing the AI's next move.

portfolio.title: Tindog
portfolio.description: Mock landing page created for a website designed to help your dog find the love of their life. Created using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
